ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups cubed fresh mozzarella cheese
2 fresh plum tomatoes, seeded and cut into bite-size pieces
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed

cookingTips: Cook orzo until al dente and rinse with cold water to stop cooking and cool quickly
Add olive oil to cooled pasta before adding cheese and vegetables to prevent sticking
Use fresh mozzarella at room temperature and add just before serving to prevent it from melting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Advise on the importance of cooling pasta properly before assembly and why fresh mozzarella should be added last.
